mapper.select: select tti.q_idx, tpi.main_prob_diff as diff_level, tpi.prob_no, 0 as correct, tti.topic_nm, tti.categ_cd, tti.categ_nm, tti.chapter_nm, tti.section_nm, tti.subsection_nm, tpi.imgpath, tpi.mv_path as video_url from ai_model_showcase.tb_prob_info tpi join ai_model_showcase.tb_topic_info tti on tpi.q_idx = tti.q_idx where tti.q_idx = #{qIdx} order by tpi.main_prob_diff desc limit 5;
